mapper.insert: insert into login_table(id, password, teamName, email) values(#{id},#{password},#{teamName},#{email})
insert into player_table(playerName, position, age, height, backNumber) values(#{playerName}, #{position}, #{age}, #{height}, #{backNumber})
mapper.select: select playerName, position, age, height, quarter, assist, block, steel, rebound, offensiveRebound, defensiveRebound, turnover, point, backNumber from player_table order by backNumber DESC
select playerName, position, quarter, point, backNumber, (point / quarter) AS averagePoint from player_table order by averagePoint DESC limit 5
select playerName, position, backNumber, assist, quarter, (assist / quarter) AS averageAssist from player_table order by averageAssist DESC limit 5
select playerName, position, backNumber, steel, quarter, (steel / quarter) AS averageSteel from player_table order by averageSteel DESC limit 5
select playerName, position, backNumber, block, quarter, (block / quarter) AS averageBlock from player_table order by averageBlock DESC limit 5
select playerName, position, backNumber, Rebound, quarter, (Rebound / quarter) AS averageRebound from player_table order by averageRebound DESC limit 5
select playerName, position, backNumber, turnover, quarter, (turnover / quarter) AS averageTurnover from player_table order by averageTurnover DESC limit 5
